thread.section_title: Support Petitions on Political Issues that Matter to You
thread.title: I Demand that the Cruel unlawful Killings of Giraffes be looked into and Ceased.
thread.title_full: I Demand that the Cruel unlawful Killings of Giraffes be looked into and Ceased.

title: I Demand that the Cruel unlawful Killings of Giraffes be looked into and Ceased.
text:
by: Tonia Turner T target: Facebook Members 
There are so many of our Beautiful Giraffes being Killed,mostly by Trophy üèÜ Hunters. These wonderful Animals are soon to become Extinct. Please sign this Petition and state why you are concerned for the Giraffes. Tour voices can make a difference! Thank you
